forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies this afternoon. High 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 11C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 52F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 34F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 53F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 54F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 10C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low around 50F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
